original_text: ‘On that day, the people from many countries will come to me, the Lord, and they will become my people. I will live among you. You will know that the Lord Almighty has sent me.
korean_text: 그 날에 많은 나라가 여호와께 속하여 내 백성이 될 것이요 나는 네 가운데에 머물리라 네가 만군의 여호와께서 나를 네게 보내신 줄 알리라

sentences.original_text: the people from many countries will come to me
sentences.korean_translation: 여러 나라에서 온 백성들이 내게로 올 것입니다

sentences.original_text: and they will become my people
that the Lord Almighty has sent me
